translatedContent: 最棒的是，每个健康检查都可以配合 Slack、Teams、PagerDuty、Discord、Twilio 等多种方式进行告警。

originContent: checks can be paired with alerting via Slack, Teams, PagerDuty, Discord, Twilio and many more.

originContent: Before getting into the specifics, I want to address the most common question:
translatedContent: 在进入具体细节之前，我想先回答最常见的问题：

originContent: > Why would I use Gatus when I can just use Prometheus’ Alertmanager, Cloudwatch or even Splunk?
translatedContent: > 当我可以使用 Prometheus 的 Alertmanager、Cloudwatch 甚至 Splunk 时，为什么还要用 Gatus？

originContent: Neither of these can tell you that there’s a problem if there are no clients actively calling the endpoint.
translatedContent: 如果没有客户端主动调用端点，这些工具都无法告诉你存在问题。

originContent: In other words, it's because monitoring metrics mostly rely on existing traffic, which effectively means that unless
translatedContent: 换句话说，因为监控指标大多依赖于现有流量，这实际上意味着除非

originContent: your clients are already experiencing a problem, you won't be notified.
translatedContent: 你的客户端已经遇到问题，否则你不会收到通知。

originContent: Gatus, on the other hand, allows you to configure health checks for each of your features, which in turn allows it to
translatedContent: 另一方面，Gatus 允许你为每个功能配置健康检查，这反过来使它能够

originContent: monitor these features and potentially alert you before any clients are impacted.
translatedContent: 监控这些功能，并可能在任何客户端受到影响之前提醒你。

originContent: A sign you may want to look into Gatus is by simply asking yourself whether you'd receive an alert if your load balancer
translatedContent: 你可能需要考虑使用 Gatus 的一个标志是，问问自己如果你的负载均衡器

originContent: was to go down right now. Will any of your existing alerts be triggered? Your metrics won’t report an increase in errors
translatedContent: 现在故障，你会收到警报吗？你现有的警报会被触发吗？如果没有流量到达你的应用，

originContent: if no traffic makes it to your applications. This puts you in a situation where your clients are the ones
translatedContent: 你的指标不会报告错误增加。这使你处于一种情况：是你的客户通知你服务退化，

originContent: that will notify you about the degradation of your services rather than you reassuring them that you're working on
translatedContent: 而不是你在他们知道问题之前就向他们保证你正在修复问题。

originContent: fixing the issue before they even know about it.
The main features of Gatus are:

translatedContent: - **高度灵活的健康检查条件**：虽然检查响应状态可能对某些用例已足够，Gatus 走得更远，允许你对响应时间、响应体甚至 IP 地址添加条件。

originContent: - **Highly flexible health check conditions**: While checking the response status may be enough for some use cases, Gatus goes much further and allows you to add conditions on the response time, the response body and even the IP address.
translatedContent: - **可用于用户验收测试**：得益于上述功能，你可以利用此应用创建自动化的用户验收测试。

originContent: - **Ability to use Gatus for user acceptance tests**: Thanks to the point above, you can leverage this application to create automated user acceptance tests.
translatedContent: - **配置非常简单**：配置不仅设计得尽可能易读，添加新的服务或新的监控端点也极其简单。

originContent: - **Very easy to configure**: Not only is the configuration designed to be as readable as possible, it's also extremely easy to add a new service or a new endpoint to monitor.
translatedContent: - **告警功能**：虽然一个美观的仪表盘有助于跟踪应用状态，但你可能不想整天盯着它看。因此，Gatus 开箱即支持通过 Slack、Mattermost、Messagebird、PagerDuty、Twilio、Google Chat 和 Teams 发送通知，并且支持配置自定义告警提供者，以满足你可能有的任何需求，无论是不同的提供者还是管理自动回滚的自定义应用。

originContent: - **Alerting**: While having a pretty visual dashboard is useful to keep track of the state of your application(s), you probably don't want to stare at it all day. Thus, notifications via Slack, Mattermost, Messagebird, PagerDuty, Twilio, Google chat and Teams are supported out of the box with the ability to configure a custom alerting provider for any needs you might have, whether it be a different provider or a custom application that manages automated rollbacks.

translatedContent: - **低资源消耗**：和大多数 Go 应用一样，此应用所需的资源占用极小。

originContent: - **Low resource consumption**: As with most Go applications, the resource footprint that this application requires is negligibly small.

originContent: If `GATUS_CONFIG_PATH` points to a directory, all `*.yaml` and `*.yml` files inside said directory and its
translatedContent: - 所有映射/对象都会进行深度合并（即您可以在一个文件中定义 `alerting.slack`，在另一个文件中定义 `alerting.pagerduty`）
- 所有切片/数组都会被追加（即您可以在多个文件中定义 `endpoints`，每个端点都会被添加到最终的端点列表中）

originContent: - All maps/objects are deep merged (i.e. you could define `alerting.slack` in one file and `alerting.pagerduty` in another file)
translatedContent: - 具有原始值的参数（例如 `metrics`、`alerting.slack.webhook-url` 等）只能定义一次，以强制避免任何歧义

originContent: - All slices/arrays are appended (i.e. you can define `endpoints` in multiple files and each endpoint will be added to the final list of endpoints)
translatedContent: - 具体来说，这也意味着您不能在两个文件中以不同的值定义 `alerting.slack.webhook-url`。所有文件在处理前都会合并成一个文件。这是设计使然。

originContent: - Parameters with a primitive value (e.g. `metrics`, `alerting.slack.webhook-url`, etc.) may only be defined once to forcefully avoid any ambiguity
- To clarify, this also means that you could not define `alerting.slack.webhook-url` in two files with different values. All files are merged into one before they are processed. This is by design.

translatedContent: 端点是您想要监控的 URL、应用或服务。每个端点都有一组条件，这些条件会在您定义的间隔内进行评估。如果有任何条件失败，端点即被视为不健康。
然后您可以配置告警，在端点不健康达到某个阈值时触发告警。

originContent: Endpoints are URLs, applications, or services that you want to monitor. Each endpoint has a list of conditions that are
evaluated on an interval that you define. If any condition fails, the endpoint is considered as unhealthy.

- `[RANDOM_STRING_N]`（解析为长度为 N 的随机数字字母字符串）

- `[RANDOM_STRING_N]` (resolves to a random string of numbers and letters of length N)
Unlike regular endpoints, external endpoints are not monitored by Gatus, but they are instead pushed programmatically.
translatedContent: 与常规端点不同，外部端点不由 Gatus 监控，而是通过编程方式推送。

originContent: This allows you to monitor anything you want, even when what you want to check lives in an environment that would not normally be accessible by Gatus.
translatedContent: 这允许您监控任何您想要的内容，即使您想检查的内容位于 Gatus 通常无法访问的环境中。

originContent: - You can create your own agent that lives in a private network and pushes the status of your services to a publicly-exposed Gatus instance
translatedContent: - 您可以创建一个位于私有网络中的代理，将服务状态推送到公开暴露的 Gatus 实例

originContent: - You can monitor services that are not supported by Gatus
translatedContent: - 您可以监控 Gatus 不支持的服务

originContent: - You can implement your own monitoring system while using Gatus as the dashboard
translatedContent: - 您可以实现自己的监控系统，同时使用 Gatus 作为仪表板

originContent: To push the status of an external endpoint, the request would have to look like this:
- `{key}` has the pattern `<GROUP_NAME>_<ENDPOINT_NAME>` in which both variables have ` `, `/`, `_`, `,`, `.` and `#` replaced by `-`.
translatedContent: - `{key}` 的格式是 `<GROUP_NAME>_<ENDPOINT_NAME>`，其中两个变量中的 ` `、`/`、`_`、`,`、`.` 和 `#` 都被替换为 `-`。

originContent: - Using the example configuration above, the key would be `core_ext-ep-test`.
translatedContent: - 使用上面示例配置，key 会是 `core_ext-ep-test`。

originContent: - `{success}` is a boolean (`true` or `false`) value indicating whether the health check was successful or not.
translatedContent: - `{success}` 是一个布尔值（`true` 或 `false`），表示健康检查是否成功。

originContent: - `{error}` (optional): a string describing the reason for a failed health check. If {success} is false, this should contain the error message; if the check is successful.
translatedContent: - `{error}`（可选）：描述健康检查失败原因的字符串。如果 {success} 为 false，则应包含错误信息；如果检查成功，则不包含。

originContent: - `{duration}` (optional): the time that the request took as a duration string (e.g. 10s).
translatedContent: - `{duration}`（可选）：请求所用时间，格式为持续时间字符串（例如 10s）。

originContent: You must also pass the token as a `Bearer` token in the `Authorization` header.
translatedContent: 你还必须将令牌作为 `Bearer` 令牌通过 `Authorization` 头传递。

originContent: Here are some examples of conditions you can use:
translatedContent: 以下是一些你可以使用的条件示例：

originContent: | Condition                        | Description                                         | Passing values             | Failing values   |
translatedContent: | 条件                              | 描述                                               | 通过的值                  | 失败的值        |

originContent: | `[STATUS] <= 299`                | Status must be less than or equal to 299            | 200, 201, 299              | 301, 302, ...    |
| `[CONNECTED] == true`            | Connection to host must've been successful          | true                       | false            |
translatedContent: | `[CONNECTED] == true`            | 与主机的连接必须成功                              | true                      | false           |
| `[RESPONSE_TIME] < 500`          | 响应时间必须低于 500 毫秒                         | 100ms，200ms，300ms       | 500ms，501ms    |

originContent: | `[BODY] == 1`                    | The body must be equal to 1                         | 1                          | `{}`, `2`, ...   |
| `[BODY].user.name == john`       | JSONPath value of `$.user.name` is equal to `john`  | `{"user":{"name":"john"}}` |                  |
| `[BODY].data[0].id == 1`         | JSONPath value of `$.data[0].id` is equal to 1      | `{"data":[{"id":1}]}`      |                  |
| `[BODY].age == [BODY].id`        | JSONPath value of `$.age` is equal JSONPath `$.id`  | `{"age":1,"id":1}`         |                  |
| `len([BODY].data) < 5`           | Array at JSONPath `$.data` has less than 5 elements | `{"data":[{"id":1}]}`      |                  |
| `len([BODY].name) == 8`          | String at JSONPath `$.name` has a length of 8       | `{"name":"john.doe"}`      | `{"name":"bob"}` |
| `[BODY].name == pat(john*)`      | String at JSONPath `$.name` matches pattern `john*` | `{"name":"john.doe"}`      | `{"name":"bob"}` |
translatedContent: | `[BODY].name == pat(john*)`      | JSONPath `$.name` 的字符串匹配模式 `john*`          | `{"name":"john.doe"}`     | `{"name":"bob"}`|

originContent: | `[BODY].id == any(1, 2)`         | Value at JSONPath `$.id` is equal to `1` or `2`     | 1, 2                       | 3, 4, 5          |
translatedContent: | `[BODY].id == any(1, 2)`         | JSONPath `$.id` 的值等于 `1` 或 `2`                 | 1，2                      | 3，4，5         |

originContent: | `[CERTIFICATE_EXPIRATION] > 48h` | Certificate expiration is more than 48h away        | 49h, 50h, 123h             | 1h, 24h, ...     |
translatedContent: | `[CERTIFICATE_EXPIRATION] > 48h` | 证书过期时间距离现在超过 48 小时                   | 49h，50h，123h            | 1h，24h，...    |

originContent: | `[DOMAIN_EXPIRATION] > 720h`     | The domain must expire in more than 720h            | 4000h                      | 1h, 24h, ...     |
translatedContent: | `[DOMAIN_EXPIRATION] > 720h`     | 域名过期时间距离现在超过 720 小时                  | 4000h                     | 1h，24h，...    |

originContent: | Placeholder                | Description                                                                               | Example of resolved value                    |
translatedContent: | 占位符                      | 描述                                                                                   | 解析后的示例值                       |

originContent: | `[STATUS]`                 | Resolves into the HTTP status of the request                                              | `404`                                        |
translatedContent: | `[STATUS]`                 | 解析为请求的 HTTP 状态码                                                               | `404`                              |

originContent: | `[RESPONSE_TIME]`          | Resolves into the response time the request took, in ms                                   | `10`                                         |
translatedContent: | `[RESPONSE_TIME]`          | 解析为请求响应时间，单位为毫秒                                                         | `10`                               |

originContent: | `[IP]`                     | Resolves into the IP of the target host                                                   | `192.168.0.232`                              |
| `[BODY]`                   | Resolves into the response body. Supports JSONPath.                                       | `{"name":"john.doe"}`                        |
translatedContent: | `[BODY]`                   | 解析为响应体，支持 JSONPath                                                            | `{"name":"john.doe"}`              |

originContent: | `[CONNECTED]`              | Resolves into whether a connection could be established                                   | `true`                                       |
translatedContent: | `[CONNECTED]`              | 解析为是否成功建立连接                                                                 | `true`                            |

originContent: | `[CERTIFICATE_EXPIRATION]` | Resolves into the duration before certificate expiration (valid units are "s", "m", "h".) | `24h`, `48h`, 0 (if not protocol with certs) |
translatedContent: | `[CERTIFICATE_EXPIRATION]` | 解析为证书过期前的持续时间（有效单位为 "s"、"m"、"h"）                                 | `24h`，`48h`，0（如果协议无证书）  |

originContent: | `[DOMAIN_EXPIRATION]`      | Resolves into the duration before the domain expires (valid units are "s", "m", "h".)     | `24h`, `48h`, `1234h56m78s`                  |
translatedContent: | `[DOMAIN_EXPIRATION]`      | 解析为域名过期前的持续时间（有效单位为 "s"、"m"、"h"）                                | `24h`，`48h`，`1234h56m78s`       |

originContent: | `[DNS_RCODE]`              | Resolves into the DNS status of the response                                              | `NOERROR`                                    |
translatedContent: | `[DNS_RCODE]`              | 解析为 DNS 响应状态码                                                                 | `NOERROR`                         |

| 函数     | 描述                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | 示例                              |

originContent: | `len`    | If the given path leads to an array, returns its length. Otherwise, the JSON at the given path is minified and converted to a string, and the resulting number of characters is returned. Works only with the `[BODY]` placeholder. | `len([BODY].username) > 8`         |
translatedContent: | `len`    | 如果给定路径对应数组，则返回其长度。否则，给定路径的 JSON 会被压缩转为字符串，返回字符数。仅适用于 `[BODY]` 占位符。                                                                                                | `len([BODY].username) > 8`        |

originContent: | `has`    | Returns `true` or `false` based on whether a given path is valid. Works only with the `[BODY]` placeholder.                                                                                                                         | `has([BODY].errors) == false`      |
translatedContent: | `has`    | 判断给定路径是否有效，返回 `true` 或 `false`。仅适用于 `[BODY]` 占位符。                                                                                                                                                | `has([BODY].errors) == false`     |

originContent: | `pat`    | Specifies that the string passed as parameter should be evaluated as a pattern. Works only with `==` and `!=`.                                                                                                                      | `[IP] == pat(192.168.*)`           |
translatedContent: | `pat`    | 指定传入的字符串参数应作为模式进行匹配。仅适用于 `==` 和 `!=`。                                                                                                                                                          | `[IP] == pat(192.168.*)`          |

originContent: | `any`    | Specifies that any one of the values passed as parameters is a valid value. Works only with `==` and `!=`.                                                                                                                          | `[BODY].ip == any(127.0.0.1, ::1)` |
translatedContent: | `any`    | 指定多个参数中任意一个为有效值。仅适用于 `==` 和 `!=`。                                                                                                                                                                  | `[BODY].ip == any(127.0.0.1, ::1)`|

originContent: > 💡 Use `pat` only when you need to. `[STATUS] == pat(2*)` is a lot more expensive than `[STATUS] < 300`.
translatedContent: > 💡 仅在必要时使用 `pat`。`[STATUS] == pat(2*)` 比 `[STATUS] < 300` 的性能开销要大得多。

translatedContent: > 📝 如果将 `disable-monitoring-lock` 设置为 `true`，则此规则不适用，因为监控锁负责
> 告诉 Gatus 一次只评估一个端点。

originContent: > 📝 This does not apply if `disable-monitoring-lock` is set to `true`, as the monitoring lock is what
> tells Gatus to only evaluate one endpoint at a time.
translatedContent: 为了确保 Gatus 提供可靠且准确的结果（即响应时间），Gatus 一次只评估一个端点。
换句话说，即使你有多个端点设置了相同的间隔，它们也不会同时执行。

originContent: To ensure that Gatus provides reliable and accurate results (i.e. response time), Gatus only evaluates one endpoint at a time
In other words, even if you have multiple endpoints with the same interval, they will not execute at the same time.
translatedContent: 你可以通过运行配置了多个端点且间隔非常短（例如 1ms，不现实）的 Gatus 来自己测试。
你会注意到响应时间不会波动——这是因为虽然端点是在不同的 goroutine 上评估的，

originContent: You can test this yourself by running Gatus with several endpoints configured with a very short, unrealistic interval,
translatedContent: 但有一个全局锁防止多个端点同时运行。

originContent: such as 1ms. You'll notice that the response time does not fluctuate - that is because while endpoints are evaluated on
different goroutines, there's a global lock that prevents multiple endpoints from running at the same time.
translatedContent: 不幸的是，这带来一个缺点。如果你有很多端点，其中一些非常慢或容易超时
（默认超时时间为 10 秒），那么在整个请求持续时间内，其他端点无法被评估。

originContent: Unfortunately, there is a drawback. If you have a lot of endpoints, including some that are very slow or prone to timing out
(the default timeout is 10s), then it means that for the entire duration of the request, no other endpoint can be evaluated.
translatedContent: 间隔不包括请求本身的持续时间，这意味着如果某个端点的间隔是 30 秒，
而请求完成需要 2 秒，那么两次评估之间的时间戳将是 32 秒，而不是 30 秒。

originContent: The interval does not include the duration of the request itself, which means that if an endpoint has an interval of 30s
and the request takes 2s to complete, the timestamp between two evaluations will be 32s, not 30s.
translatedContent: 虽然这不会阻止 Gatus 对所有其他端点执行健康检查，但可能导致 Gatus 无法

originContent: While this does not prevent Gatus' from performing health checks on all other endpoints, it may cause Gatus to be unable
translatedContent: - 端点 A 的间隔是 5 秒，且超时设置为 10 秒完成

originContent: to respect the configured interval, for instance:
translatedContent: - 端点 B 的间隔是 5 秒，且完成时间为 1 毫秒

originContent: - Endpoint A has an interval of 5s, and times out after 10s to complete
translatedContent: - 端点 B 无法每 5 秒运行一次，因为端点 A 的健康评估时间超过了它的间隔

originContent: - Endpoint B has an interval of 5s, and takes 1ms to complete
- Endpoint B will be unable to run every 5s, because endpoint A's health evaluation takes longer than its interval
translatedContent: 总结来说，虽然 Gatus 可以处理你设置的任何间隔，但如果请求较慢，最好设置较长的间隔。

originContent: To sum it up, while Gatus can handle any interval you throw at it, you're better off having slow requests with
translatedContent: 作为经验法则，我个人将复杂健康检查的间隔设置为 `5m`（5 分钟），
用于告警（PagerDuty/Twilio）的简单健康检查设置为 `30s`。

originContent: As a rule of thumb, I personally set the interval for more complex health checks to `5m` (5 minutes) and
simple health checks used for alerting (PagerDuty/Twilio) to `30s`.
